name: Zimbra Dark Purple
description: Zimbra with a touch of my own personal stylings. Not the best looking but better than hot white light in your eye. Thanks to abolling for giving a jumping off point. Did some fix ups and added some color. Zimbra's css is a complete mess so there will be small issues. I've fixed as many as i could find and the code is enormous pile of clutter that likely has redundant parts in it. But as far as a i can tell it works.
